law.catch_line: Bylaws of Interstate Mining Commission -- Where filed.
law.text: In accordance with Article V(i) of the compact, the commission shall file copies of its bylaws and any amendments thereto with the Energy and Environment Cabinet.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1887, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. III, sec. 13(7). -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 31.
